General.Name: Chacha Food Co Ltd
General.Description: Chacha Food Company, Limited produces and sells nuts, seeds, and snacks in China. It offers caramel, pecan, vine pepper, sea salt melon, sunflower, melon, pumpkin, cantaloupe, and watermelon seeds; pecans, pistachio, almonds, walnuts, crispy cashews, and other nut products; potato crisp, peanuts, and other snack foods; melon seed face masks; gift boxes; and other products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Hefei, China.

4.Name: Ms. Shu Hong  Wang
4.Title: Gen. Mang. of Audit Headquarters and Member of Supervisory Board
